titleStmt.title: The Songs to the new play of Don Quixote as they are sung at the Queen's Theatre in Dorset Garden / set by the most eminent masters of the age ; all written by Mr. D'urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall for Samuel Briscoe,

notesStmt.note: Includes "Part the first" and "Part the second", each with separate t.p. and pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
